name: Pale Void ⊶ Minimalist White Theme
description: Customizable color details! Default are blue, red and purple but if you feel creative you can choose others, or pick your favorite one and set it everywhere. Have fun! ↪Reblogged post & icon. ↪Opposite theme: Dark Void. ☁☁☁☁☁☁☁☁☁ ⇢Follow sugoi dashboards for more!
